item.title: Who Needs A T1 Line at Home?
item.description: T1 lines are famous for their reliability and accessibility wherever there’s telephone service, but they might not be suitable for everyone’s home broadband needs. The cost alone is a major deterrent for most people. However, in some situations, a T1 line might be the only practical option. Residential broadband prioritizes affordability to reach a broad market. That’s why DSL services can cost under $20 monthly, and Cable broadband with 3 to 6 Mbps typically costs $30 to $40.
